Beautiful pre-war 2 bedroom in Prime Williamsburg
Located at Roebling and South 3rd --- 4 minutes to the Marcy JMZ
2 big sunny bedrooms real living room with great layout -- fits a sofa, coffee table and TV separate kitchen tons of natural light in all rooms inc heat and hot water
September 1st move in Small pets OK

Myspace Exclusive! Gorgeous renovation in historic prewar building steps from the Myrtle JMZ in prime Bushwick, only a short stroll from the Morgan/Jefferson L!
This beautiful two bedroom features high ceilings, exposed brick, custom moldings, separate eat-in kitchen w/ island, dishwasher, separate living room with tons of natural light, two evenly sized queen bedrooms with closets, lovely hardwood floors, tons of natural light in every room, washer/dryer in unit, additional coat/storage closet in hallway leading to luxe modern bathroom w/ deep soaking tub.
Tucked away from street noise on the second floor facing the back of the property, you will sleep sound! Surrounded by the best selection of bars, restaurants, music/art venues, thrift shops, grocery stores, and transportation options! Steps from Myrtle JMZ express to Lower Manhattan, or a short stroll to the L train at either Morgan or Jefferson!
Only first & security! Heat & hot water included!

Myspace Exclusive!
2 bedroom layout lots of sunlight! Stainless steel appliances, eat in kitchen. Nice layout!
The building is an extremely well-maintained 1920s prewar featuring stainless appliances, hardwood floors, tons of sunlight, high ceilings and lots of space. Pet friendly, heat & hot water included!
This is the ideal opportunity to live in one of Brooklyn?s hottest neighborhoods. . Located just a few blocks to Williamsburg Smorgasburg/Flea Market. Cut your commute time to the city with the J, M, Z trains minutes from your door. Domino Park, Sea Wolf, Social House Cafe, Patrizia's of Williamsburg, Giando on the Water, etc nearby.
Available 11/1 No broker fee Small pets OK

Super sized 1 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
Big bedroom Large living area with windows Stainless steel kitchen Heat and hot water included Exposed brick
Perfect location, near all things that make Williamsburg, Williamsburg! JMZ and G trains nearby. Local hotspots such as L'Industrie Pizzeria, Pies 'n' Thighs, Vanessa's Dumpling House, Banter Bar, Nighthawk Cinema, etc
Available Oct 1st Small pets accepted

Myspace Exclusive!
One bedroom + Home office available with separate living room and kitchen in 1920s elevator prewar with live-in super.
- Queen sized bedroom - Full sized bedroom - MASSIVE living room space - Tons of light, exposed brick, updated modern bathroom, kingsize bedrooms & plenty of space for entertaining.
Fabulous location just steps from Montrose L / Flushing JMZ trains and surrounded by tons of great bars, restaurants & shopping. Short commute to Manhattan!
Available now No broker fee Heat & hot water included Small pets welcome

Gorgeous 2BR in the heart of Williamsburg, close to the L,G and JMZ train lines. This lovely apartment features a queen size bedroom drenched in sunlight with large closet, separate kitchen with lots of cabinet and counter space, stainless steel appliances, large updated bathroom with deep soaking bathtub, and spacious separate living room with TONS of light throughout.
Pets allowed, live-in super, only first & security. Plus, heat and hot water are included!
Small pets OK Available 10/1

Beautifully NEWLY RENOVATED 1 bed in Williamsburg
Located at Rodney and South 4th 3 minutes door to platform ? Marcy JMZ
Brand new renovation with TONS of natural light New kitchen / bath Stainless steel appliances
Located directly at the entrance to the Williamsburg Bridge, this apartment perfect for any commute into the city. 3 blocks from the Marcy JMZ. 10 minute commute into the city. Around the corner from Broadway, which has everything you need.
Heat and Hot water are included This apartment is an amazing deal in this location, do not miss out!
Available 10/1 Small pets welcome

Beautiful 1 bedroom on Crown St with high ceilings. Oak wood floors. Stainless steel kitchen. Fully tiled bathroom with large soaking tub. Heat and hot water included. Near Prospect Park,Brooklyn Museum and a short walk to Franklin Ave bars and restaurants. Near the 2 and 5 trains.
1/1 move in Broker fee applies

Super sized 2 bedroom in prime Williamsburg!
- no broker fee
2 nice bedrooms Large living area with windows Stainless steel kitchen Heat and hot water included Exposed brick

Nice new 1 bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg - just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, sunny kitchen with stainless steel appliances, and heat and hot water is included.
Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan! Montrose L train.
Available now Small pets OK

Myspace Exclusive! Large one bedroom apartment in East Williamsburg ? just around the corner from the Montrose L and Lorimer J/M trains.
The apartment features: Hardwood floors, king sized bedroom, ample closet space, large living room and separate kitchen. Pets are welcome. Surrounded by the best local bars, restaurants, cafes, and a short commute to Manhattan!
NO BROKER FEE! Small pets OK 10/1 move in

Sunny penthouse corner unit 2 bed / 1 bath with private balcony!
Unit features: Corner unit has additional large window in the living room! Vaulted ceilings, tons of natural light! Hardwood floors Dishwasher Stainless steel appliances Custom kitchen and bath with beautiful tile work and granite countertops Floor to ceiling windows Separate efficient PTAC heat and cooling units in all rooms Queen Sized bedrooms Owner will purchase additional armoire / standing closet if needed
Building features: Elevator Huge Roof deck ButterflyMX intercom Latch bluetooth lock system Multiple laundry room Parking Zipcars available Bike storage Go Lockers for shipping and receiving packages securely State-of-the-art security system throughout Fantastic location close to tons of cool local spots as well as a 2min walk to the Myrtle/Broadway JMZ and 12min to the L train.
Pets ok No fee $20 app feeCall or text to view the right away. This is priced to GO!

Chic 2.5 Bedroom Apartment with massive private balcony right in the Heart of Bushwick! Owner will also purchase standing closets if you want. One bedroom is smaller with a window bringing light in from the back bedroom. It's perfect as an office / extra common space , or as a small 3rd bedroom for someone who's budget is less. See video for layout . 1min walk to the Dekalb L. 5min to the M train.
Featuring: -Private Balcony with access from both bedrooms - Large Open Living Room - Queen Size Bedrooms - Stainless Steel Appliances - Including Dishwasher - And Microwave! - Laundry in Building - Large windows - Plenty of sunlight! - Elevator - 2 huge Roof decks - Off street Parking with Bluetooth door opener ? Designated parking spots $250/mo - Zipcar in Garage
Such a great location, with tons of cafe?s, bars and restaurants within a five minute walk! Variety Coffee, Taquiera Cocoyoc, Milk and Pull, The Johnson?s, Maria Hernandez Park, and many more!
Just first and security to move in. NO BROKER FEE!! Call or text to set up viewing right away.

Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. Primo location right off the Morgan stop of the L train. - Elevator- Laundry Room- Roof top with AMAZING view of Manhattan- Dishwasher, Microwave, Stainless Steel Appliances- Hardwood floors- Garage under the building - Zip Cars available- Separate enclosed AC/Heating units for each room. Quiet and efficient?Just first and security deposit to move in, NO FEE!Pets OK!note: if you can't see the video please send me a message and I'll send it over.

Can be used as a 2br with small common space in the middle or a large 1br. Private outdoor space. Heat and hot water included! Both room are very large. Custom kitchen with granite countertops, microwave and stainless steel appliances. Large enough for kitchen table and chairs. Large renovated bathroom. Located at Harman right off Knickerbocker Ave. Close to the Knickerbocker M Train or the Dekalb L Train.
Located in the back building away from any street noise. Large shared courtyard for the building. See video on streeteasy or message me and I'll send to you.
Pets ok! $20 application fee Heat and hot water included Sorry, no laundry in the building.
Call or text to set up a viewing right away!

Chic 2.5 Bedroom Apartment with massive private balcony right in the Heart of Bushwick! This has often been used as a 3br, all rooms fit a queen sized bed. However one of the bedrooms has no window to the outside, does have a cutout brining in light from other bedroom. Makes a great office or extra hangout space! Owner will also purchase standing closets if you want. 1min walk to the Dekalb L. 5min to the M train. Featuring:
- Private Balcony
- Large Open Living Room - Queen Size Bedrooms - Stainless Steel Appliances - Including Dishwasher - And Microwave! - Laundry in Building - Large windows - Plenty of sunlight! - Elevator - Roof deck - Garage - Zipcar in Garage, yas!

Just first and security to move in. NO BROKER FEE!!

Lovely two bedroom apartment located in the heart of Bushwick. The apartment features hardwood floors throughout and a renovated kitchen with stainless steal appliances and butcher block bar/island. The large bedrooms have plenty of natural light to start your morning off right. The building is pet friendly and has laundry facility in the basement so no need to haul those heavy laundry bags. Great location just one block from Maria Hernandez Park, Jefferson L train stop and surrounded by popular taverns and cafes. No fee!

Beautifully renovated 2br in an elevator building. Has an amazing roof deck with skyline views. Laundry in the building as well. See video on StreetEasy or send message and I?ll text it to you
Hardwood floors Renovated kitchen and bath Stainless steel appliances. Laundry in the building Less than a 5 minute walk from the BOTH the L and M train. Right in the center of Bushwick steps away from all you favorite local spots!
NO BROKER FEE! Just 1st and security to move in Pets ok

Second bedroom makes a great office or extra hangout space! Both bedroom fit queen sized beds. Owner will also purchase standing closets if you want. 1min walk to the Dekalb L. 5min to the M train. Available 10/1!
2 BEDROOM 2 FULL PRIVATE BATH
-Open concept living room and modern kitchen -Stainless steel appliances -Hardwood floors -High ceilings -Sunny windows in every room! Nearby subway stations include: Myrtle ? Willoughby Ave(G), Myrtle Av (J, M).

Welcome to 487 Keap, a brand new rental building seconds to Metropolitan/Union Avenue L train Very well maintained ? beautiful common areas including a landscaped roof deck with lounge chairs, bar, and outdoor shower. Full service and spacious gym, bike and additional storage are available.
This apartment is rent stabilized, you can enjoy a rent stabilized home, be protected from sharp increases in rent and have the right to renew your lease for years to come.

Virtual tours available!
Beautiful 2 bed / 1 bath apartment in Bushwick, prime location! This apartment features a spacious living room, queen-sized bedrooms, stainless steel kitchen, modern bathroom, hardwood floors, and windows that let in natural light throughout. You'll be right around the corner from dozens of top-rated bars, restaurants, cafes, grocers, and music/art venues. Local favorites include Mominette, Sea Wolf, Three Diamond Door, Precious Metal, The Rookery, Heavy Woods, Idlewild, Clara's, Yours Sincerely, Chuko, Los Hermanos, Wheelhouse. Short commute to Manhattan & easy access to the rest of Brooklyn's hottest neighborhoods. Only blocks from the L train, and a short walk to the J, M trains.

Spacious 1BR in a modern elevator building with one of the biggest living rooms you?ll find?room for dining, lounging, and working. Bright and airy with oversized windows, a large kitchen, great storage, and in-unit washer/dryer. A/C in every room, big closets, sunny bedroom.
Building perks: gym, roof deck, pet spa, parking (for a fee), lounge, bike storage. No broker fee.

Modern 2 Bed / 1 Bath at 584 4th Ave- Gowanus
Welcome to 584 4th Ave, a brand-new luxury development in the heart of Gowanus. This spacious 1-bedroom features floor-to-ceiling windows with sweeping views of Manhattan, the Statue of Liberty, and city bridges.
Enjoy premium amenities including:
Elevator
Rooftop with panoramic views
Fitness center
In-unit washer/dryer
Located near Park Slope with easy access to the F, G, D, N, and R trains, this building offers the perfect mix of style, comfort, and convenience.
Pets allowed upon approval.
Schedule a tour today!

Studios, 1- & 2-BR homes with oversized windows, white oak floors, custom kitchens, spa-style baths, and in-unit or on-site laundry. Select residences offer private balconies or terraces.
Amenities: Bike room, elevator, package room, gym, media room, and multiple outdoor spaces ? deck, garden, patio & panoramic roof deck.
Unbeatable location at the crossroads of Boerum Hill, Gowanus & Park Slope, near Whole Foods, top restaurants, boutique shops & F/G/R trains.

Do not miss out on this 2BR/1baths apartment in Brooklyn's up and coming neighborhood Prospect Lefferts Gardens! People forget that Brooklyn is the biggest borough and offers some of the best, historic architecture. Enjoy the neighborhoods easy access to the B,Q,2,3 lines, a number of bus lines, and short walk to Prospect Park. Live within steps to juice bars, grocery stores, restaurants, coffee shops, bars, pharmacies, banks, local bakeries, and more to explore. Welcome to Casa Hope Williamsburg?s new luxury development!
Sunny units with oversized windows throughout, and gorgeous finishes Steps from the L / G trains, commute to Union Square in only 13 minutes door to door!
Tons of building amenities:
Fitness center Rooftop terrace Business center On-site garage parking Lounge on 7th floor Mini lounge nook to each floor Elevator Bike room Parking garage (additional fee)
The kitchen comes equipped with brand new stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher. Gorgeous well-designed light wood cabinetry, white stone countertops and backsplashes. Modern bathrooms feature a deep soaking spa bathtub, as well as modern vanity with oversized mirror, storage cabinet space and matte black finishes. Other features include oak flooring throughout and generous closet space. Trash Chute to each floor.
Perfect location with an easy commute to the city and tons of restaurants, bars and cafes nearby Short walk from McCarren Park and the Bedford L train area

Experience Brooklyn living at 1010 Pacific St. You?ll find this community in the Prospect Heights area of Brooklyn. Experience a new standard at 1010 Pacific St.
Pacific House offers a collection of Studio, 1 and 2 Bedroom luxury apartments featuring expansive, open- concept layouts, oak floors and contemporary finishes. Residents also enjoy unparalleled access to first-class amenities, including fitness center, dedicated kids? areas, media lounge and bar and an expansive roof top with view of the city. Pacific House is centrally located in the heart of Brooklyn?s trendy prospect park neighborhood, and in close proximity to major transit hubs and an array of local amenities. Nearby shops, restaurants, schools, outdoor parks, neighborhood services, arts and culture are all within easy reach.

77 Commercial is a new landmark on the north edge of the Greenpoint, Brooklyn waterfront, situated between two great outdoor spaces ? a beautiful, lushly landscaped inner court to the east, and the long anticipated Box Street Park to the west.
Discover a range of living spaces tailored to your needs, including studios, 1-bedroom, 2-bedroom, and 3-bedroom layouts.
Apartment Features: -Expansive living areas boasting breathtaking views -Fully equipped kitchens with stainless steel appliances -Dishwasher -In-unit washer/dryer for added convenience -Individual AC/Heat units -Big windows inviting abundant natural light -Soaring high ceilings and elegant hardwood floors
Building Amenities: -State-of-the-art fitness center -Relaxing sauna -Basketball and tennis courts -Inviting indoor pool with direct access to outdoor pool deck -Multiple BBQ grilling areas -Rooftop retreat offering panoramic views -Residents lounge and versatile working space -Entertainment-filled recreation room -Secure bicycle storage -Convenient elevators -Parking garage available (additional fee applies)
Location: Enjoy seamless access to the new esplanade and ferry terminal, ensuring swift commutes to Manhattan.

Prime Crown Heights Living at 1499 Bedford Ave!
Discover the epitome of modern living at 1499 Bedford Ave, a new building in the heart of Crown Heights. Located steps from Eastern Parkway and multiple subway lines, and within walking distance of Grand Army Plaza, Brooklyn Botanical Gardens, and Prospect Park, this residence offers unparalleled convenience and vibrant city life.
Building Amenities:
State-of-the-art fitness room Pet wash station Laundry facilities (in-unit laundry in some units) Social lounge with game room Furnished rooftop with panoramic city views Second-floor public terrace Open workstations Dedicated mail room
Unit Features: Private terraces and balconies in select units Kitchen islands in select units Large windows with abundant natural light Stunning views of NYC skyline, Prospect Park, and neighborhood streets
Welcome to 1499 Bedford Ave?where luxury, community, and convenience meet. Experience the best of Crown Heights living.
